title: VASP NEB Context Provider Schema
description: Schema for VASPNEBContextProvider that generates context data for VASP NEB (nudged elastic band) runs.

FIRST_IMAGE.description: POSCAR content with constraints for the first NEB image.

LAST_IMAGE.description: POSCAR content with constraints for the last NEB image.

INTERMEDIATE_IMAGES.description: POSCAR contents with constraints for all intermediate NEB images.
